node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 15 日出現症狀，與第 #1739 、 #1743 、 #1993 及 #1998 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history and started having symptoms on July 15. Her case is epidemiologically related to the cases of patients #1739, #1743, #1993, and #1998.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 屯門中央廣場富臨酒家
groups.name_en:
Tuen Mun Central Square Fulum
Restaurant
groups.description_zh: 7 月 11 日在屯門中央廣場富臨酒家舉行的 20  席生日聚會，及後有多名出席者確診。另外也有不同日子到訪該富臨酒家的食客確診。
groups.description_en: A birthday celebration event with 20 tables was held on Jul 11 at Fulum Restaurant, Tuen Mun Central Square. Many of the participants later tested positive. There have also been other individuals who visited the restaurants in days following the banquet who have tested positive.
